name: Paintball War
detailed_description: PaintBall War is a multiplayer, a thrilling first person shooter! The game is created on motives of entertainment in real life, called PaintBall. In the game you will find 15 markers and 4 pistols, with different damage and radius variation! Also, you can try out 2 game modes, the usual fight to the death, where you will have 100 points of health, and the real mode where you will not have right for mistake, you feel yourself as a real player in PaintBall, you will have no chance to miss, either you kill or you kill, because the weapon damage is not important there, one hit is everything! Come in and win, prove to everyone that you are the best!
about_the_game: PaintBall War is a multiplayer, a thrilling first person shooter! The game is created on motives of entertainment in real life, called PaintBall. In the game you will find 15 markers and 4 pistols, with different damage and radius variation! Also, you can try out 2 game modes, the usual fight to the death, where you will have 100 points of health, and the real mode where you will not have right for mistake, you feel yourself as a real player in PaintBall, you will have no chance to miss, either you kill or you kill, because the weapon damage is not important there, one hit is everything! Come in and win, prove to everyone that you are the best!
short_description:
PaintBall War is a multiplayer first person shooter.
The world's first full-fledged game associated with paintball.
Gain experience, earn new ranks, gain new weapons.
Good game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Athlon(tm) II X3 455 Processor 3.30 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 1Gb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Skylake 3.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All
